backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, KYC records, payout methods, and withdrawal requests with admin/user authorization and CRUD-style KYC operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing work related to expanding Nigerian bank options and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including utilities, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining build and deployment steps for local and production environments, including required environment variables.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting required UI screens, states, validations, and behavior for the betting top‑up flow implementation.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist detailing UI components, actions, modals, and state handling required for the crypto wallet dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining design tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and renders authentication, registration, and app layout logic based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface with access-control initialization and role assignment methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin-only routes by checking admin status and showing loading or access-denied UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Displays a full‑screen loading screen while Internet Identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Provides the login UI using Internet Identity with error handling, sign‑up flow, and informational dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount, and status badge.
Loads and filters local crypto transactions, displaying them with tabs and skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows crypto wallet header with balance display and visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders quick‑action buttons for common crypto actions like send, receive, buy, swap, and withdraw.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with balances and click handling, using a card layout.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Bottom sheet UI for selecting a crypto asset and amount to buy, then adding a pending local transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Displays a selectable asset, mock receive address, and copy-to-clipboard flow that logs a placeholder received transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Form to send crypto by selecting an asset, entering address and amount, then creating a pending local transaction.
Multi-step withdrawal sheet handling amount entry, payout method selection or creation, and submission of a withdrawal request.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Allows swapping between two crypto assets with mock rate calculation and logs a swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Static promo card showing a global connectivity message with illustration and pagination dots.
Configurable dashboard shortcut tile with icon, label, optional badge, and disabled or clickable states.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Renders a clickable brand row with icon fallback and name display.
Shows up to a limited number of label chips with a counter for remaining tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save editable gift card labels with change detection.
Offers a popover-based filter UI for selecting and clearing label tags.
Displays NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand in a table format.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Shows an inline NGN rate summary or an unavailable notice based on tier matching.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet listing gift card brands with search filtering and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount formatting, and status badge.
frontend/src/components/kyc/DocumentSign: Canvas overlay that loads a document image and captures signature strokes for export.
Layout component providing desktop sidebar and mobile header/navigation with route links and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Mobile bottom navigation bar component that renders route shortcuts and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Searchable dropdown component for selecting Nigerian banks using a popover and command list.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile with a name field, submit handling, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable tile component displaying a bill category label and icon for service selection.
frontend/src/config/__tests__/nigerianBa: Empty test file placeholder for Nigerian banks configuration tests.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines available betting providers and preset chip amounts for betting services.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion rate config and a utility to calculate gross, fee, and net values with optional overrides.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with names, search terms, and icon paths plus a brand filtering helper.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN gift card rate tables, brand overrides, and utilities to match amounts to tiers and format rates.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Lists Nigerian banks and includes utilities for normalizing names and filtering banks by search query.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendor data and contains helper functions to compute net payouts and select the best vendor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports the user profile query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, tags, and recent transactions into a unified dashboard dataset.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRegister: Ensures the authenticated user is registered in backend access control, handling self-registration and retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity management, and context for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Tracks browser notification permission and exposes a safe permission request method.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal local preference for in‑app notifications with persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Stores and retrieves per‑principal suppression state for dismissing the profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching hooks and backend-to-frontend type mappers for profiles, KYC, withdrawals, and documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Returns the user’s primary wallet balance and currency from their profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus a safe-area padding utility.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides class name merging, currency formatting for multiple types, and timestamp-to-date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin interface to search users by principal, view their KYC submissions, and approve or reject individual records.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Displays pending withdrawal requests and allows admins to approve or reject them with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with balance display, shortcuts, and loading states using dashboard data.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary logic.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Exports helper to compute the matched NGN rate tier for a brand and amount after validating input.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for admins to add new gift cards including brand, currency, amount, code, and optional image upload.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Shows detailed gift card info, allows updating status, editing labels, and viewing applicable NGN rate tables.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with filtering by labels and navigation to add or view individual cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Displays ranked gift cards by NGN rate, showing loading skeletons and top-three badges, with navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Computes best NGN rate per gift card and sorts cards by rate with deterministic tiebreakers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Provides a form to sell a gift card by selecting amount, vendor, and computing conversion details, with handling for loading and invalid states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays local transaction history with automatic updates and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Handles KYC submission with file upload, signature support, validation, and status display.
Implements airtime purchase form with provider, phone, and amount selection, logging transactions locally.
Handles betting top‑up flow with details and review steps, then logs a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Shows a grid of bill‑payment categories and navigates to their respective service pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Page for submitting placeholder cable TV bill payments, capturing smartcard number and amount and logging a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Crypto wallet dashboard showing mock token balances, recent activity, and action sheets for send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Page for buying mobile data with placeholder functionality, submitting phone number and amount to log a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Page for placeholder electricity bill payments, taking meter number and amount and saving a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: Page for submitting placeholder internet bill payments using an account ID and amount, logging the action locally.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows settings for authentication info and notification preferences using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: Withdrawal management page with tabs for requesting withdrawals, adding payout methods, and listing withdrawal history using query hooks.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing up to 50 local transactions in localStorage, generating IDs and timestamps automatically.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Utility for generating scoped localStorage keys and getting/setting per‑principal notification preferences.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Collection of TypeScript types for currencies, user profiles, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC records, payouts, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Type declarations for frontend environment variables II_URL and II_DERIVATION_ORIGIN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based param cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env loading, path aliasing, env shims, chunk splitting, dev proxying, and global defines.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, feature list, and pending requests for adding Nigerian digital banks.
